drugs.name: Acetylcysteine
drugs.description: used to help prevent or lessen liver damage

drugs.name: Adderall
drugs.description: used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and narcolepsy.

drugs.name: Bactroban
drugs.description: antibiotic that prevents bacteria from growing on your skin.

drugs.name: Banzel
drugs.description: a seizure medication, also called an anti-epileptic or anticonvulsant.
